frances-marie-teves.name: Frances Marie Teves
frances-marie-teves.bio: Frances Marie is currently working as a Software Engineer. Her work mainly focuses on Embedded Firmware Web Development for multi-functional printers for multiple projects. Aside from her work in technical field, she is also a Community Builder and a Freelance Tech Host. She loves to help create an avenue for developers to discover and learn more about technology. She also does freelance hosting to various events, more focused in tech-related activities. She is the current Community Manager and WTM Lead for GDG Cebu.

cleo-credo.name: Cleo Credo
cleo-credo.bio:
Cleo is a Software Engineer at Startechup,Inc. by day and a hardware enthusiast by night. She finds joy in building things and experimenting different kinds of technologies.

She also helps promote tech scene in Cebu by actively speaking at tech events, workshops and meetups as well as co-leading community-driven organizations such as PizzaPy Cebu and React Cebu.

paula-mayol.name: Paula Mayol
paula-mayol.bio:
Paula is currently an assistant professor handling major and core computer science courses in the Department of Computer Science in UP Cebu. She obtained her MS in Computer Science at UP Los Baños under the advisorship of Dr. Eliezer Albacea, an awarded NAST Scientist/Academian. She had been exposed to the rigorous “research with a purpose” environment of UPLB, and makes it her mission to instill the same values to her students.

Her research interests are on Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Software Engineering and optimization of computer systems.

When not working, she enjoys reading, drinking coffee, gardening, spending time with her family, and going up the mountain to enjoy nature and unwind. Her dream is for Cebu City to have a smart, sustainable and eco-friendly urban planning, without the need for sacrificing Mother Nature at the expense of urbanization.

franchette-camoro.name: Franchette Camoro
franchette-camoro.bio: Franchette is a Web Developer and is passionate about giving more opportunities to the local community to learn programming to build better software and products. She does this by organizing community events all year round. She also has several hobbies like yoga, reading, and binge watching on netflix.

dorell-james-galang.name: Dorell James Galang
dorell-james-galang.bio:
Dorell James is a full stack developer and web technology enthusiast who helps promote the tech scene in Cebu, Philippines by actively co-leading community-driven organizations namely Laravel Cebu, React Cebu and recently created JavaScript Cebu – do regular event meetups, code camps, school outreach and more.

He started his career as a QA - later turned software engineer at NCR while doing freelance WordPress jobs. He’s been creating web apps and integrated solutions at his full-time job while also making sure that the company is stays at the edge of technology doing business. Just recently, he fell in love with JAMstack and everything JS.

Outside of the techie world, Dorell James is a dog person, goes for bike and plays basketball quite terribly. More information about Dorell James can be found on his website at dorelljames.com.

vin-lim.name: Vin Lim
vin-lim.bio:
Vin is the Co-Founder and CEO of Green Room, a leading mobile and web application development company, with a portfolio of major international and local brands. Together with his team, he specialises in cross-platform application development, with technologies like TypeScript, Angular and various modern web technologies.

His journey in the tech and startup scene has sparked his enthusiasm in building tech community, leading to the founding of Startup Penang, GDG George Town and Angular Malaysia. To contribute to the ecosystem further, he has been speaking in various local and international tech conferences, promoting web technologies.

When he is not working, you will find him tinkering and building stuff, from applications to hardwares.

arnelle-balane.name: Arnelle Balane
arnelle-balane.bio: Arnelle is a Web developer from Cebu, Philippines who enjoys building things with good old HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Web Platform APIs. He co-organizes GDG Cebu and is an active volunteer and speaker for other local JavaScript communities. He experiments with cool new Web technologies and writes about them in his blog. When not busy experimenting with new Web APIs, he can also taking photos, playing video games, or practicing his card tricks.

riya-dashoriya.name: Riya Dashoriya
riya-dashoriya.bio: Riya Dashoriya is a Software Engineer at Quizlet, San Francisco. She is also Google Developers Group San Francisco and Cloud San Francisco organizer, as well as Ambassador for the respective Women Techmakers chapters. Riya has veritable curiosity and passion to dig into things and find out how they work. Her current favorites are Diversity & Inclusion, Communities, React, Accessibility and Actions on Google Assistant.

mark-robin.name: Mark Robin
mark-robin.bio:
Mark is a Full Stack Software Engineer and a Web Technology enthusiast. He is constantly learning new technologies and applying his professional development knowledge to solve business problems. Aside from his work, he also engages in the tech community by co-organizing GDG Cebu as the current Technical Lead.

He also finds time to balance his life by playing some sports, jamming with the guitar, unwinding in video games, joining other tech events, and reading articles or books in his spare time.

truongsinh-tran-nguyen.name: TruongSinh Tran-Nguyen
truongsinh-tran-nguyen.bio: 10 years working with teams on cloud, backend, HTML, mobile in multiple startups in Finland and Vietnam. Nordic Startup Award - People’s choice CTO 2016. Agile evangelist and Flutter advocate. Currently Engineering Director at Inspectorio.

sean-urgel.name: Sean Urgel
sean-urgel.bio: Sean is passionate about making thoughts a reality by creating meaningful products. He puts into action his principles of commitment, consistent hard work, willingness to change and adapt in product development by being a self-taught full-stack developer specializing in React development [at Symph]. He actively shares to the community his learnings and perspective in Medium.

hassan-abid.name: Hassan Abid
hassan-abid.bio:
Hassan is Google Developers Experts for Android since 2016. He is currently based in Singapore, Where he works as Lead Software Engineer for South East Asia’s Live Streaming platform - BeLive. Before that, He lived in Seoul, where he worked on Mobile Video Streaming SDK and KineMaster, an Android Video editing app.

He loves writing and sharing his experiences about Android development with fellow developers through blogs posts, events and conferences.

taegyun-jeon.name: Taegyun Jeon
taegyun-jeon.bio: Taegyun Jeon is an AI team leader at Satrec Initiative. He received Ph.D. in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science from Gwangju Institute of Science and Technology with topics of machine learning and computer vision. He is working on machine learning research for developing new business model and framework for satellite image analysis. Proficient in using TensorFlow for developing machine learning solutions. Taegyun gives talks on TensorFlow and recent papers on Machine Learning for developers.

albert-padin.name: Albert Padin
albert-padin.bio: Albert is a developer and entrepreneur who's worked on consumer, enterprise, and government software products. He is the co-founder and CTO of Symph, a design, development, and startup studio. At Symph, he has architected and developed solutions for 500 Startups, Office of the President of the Philippines, and the World Bank. Albert leads a diverse team of developers in creating software solutions. He ensures that the team's output is high quality and performs well at scale. Albert is also passionate about empowering startups and has been involved in the Philippine Startup Ecosystem, by facilitating and mentoring at Startup Weekends and other events. Prior to that, Albert started SpellDial, directed plays, and mentored street children. He studied Information Technology at the Centre for International Education Global Colleges. He lives in Cebu City, Philippines with his wife. His interests include theatre, performing arts, and the non-trivial act of eradicating poverty.

faye-lomente.name: Faye Lomente
faye-lomente.bio: Faye is a Junior Software Developer at a consultancy and development company based in Singapore. Her work focuses mainly on web engineering using Python and Django as the web framework. She learned programming and its basics when she took Computer Science as a bachelor's degree. When she's away from the keyboard, she loves spending her "me" time on anything that makes her forget about her phone such as books, poetry, anime, movies, sports and travel.

cyrus-hiyas.name: Cyrus Hiyas
cyrus-hiyas.bio: I am a software engineer from Amihan Global Strategies and knows some stuff regarding Angular Framework. I have been talking to various code camps already and have shared knowledge to people.
